tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Consider yourself fortunate if your dental issues bring you to Dr Shetty. He is a master of his craft, one of the most empathetic, ethical, self-assured and intelligent doctors I have been to. He truly  engages with patients without rushing anything and logically explains every bit of the procedure. He will always follow up with patients post procedure to check progress and is always a call away.

And above all, an uncanny ability to put all their anxieties to rest.

Dr Shetty, you aren't just a great doctor but equally great human being. Thank you and stay blessed.
reply_text: This coming from you means a lot to me.  Thank you.. thanks a million. That's very very reassuring.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

reply_text: Thanks a lot Marcus❤️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I’ve been going to Dr. Jeevan Shetty as a child and years later, it has still been one of the most comforting medical visits. I tend to panic and feel great anxiety over dental treatments in general. Dr. Shetty not only explained the procedure and aftercare in detail but reassured me, helped me calm down and made sure that I feel confident enough to come for my future extractions. Highly recommend him especially with your children or senior citizens that would need greater support during the course of their treatments.
reply_text: Can't see your name,  but i guess it's Kiara. You will always remain a special patient dear. God bless you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Visit to Dentist, Dr Jeevan Shetty: 
Extracted my wisdom tooth. The tooth looked quite normal, like any other teeth but it was very painful.
The left side of my head started aching very badly, the left temple side's blood vessel veins pulsating could not only be felt but also seen, it was so painful. I have preserved the extracted tooth. The rot in the tooth could be seen only after extraction. The rot is the result of my carelessness.
Not brushing my teeth before going to bed is the prise I had to pay.
I thank Dr. Jeevan Shetty for extracting my rotten tooth without damage to any other teeth, gums, cheeck or tongue.
At night I enjoyed my ice cream, cold milkshake with bananas and a good night sleep.
I am back to normal.
reply_text: Thank you for your response sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: How awesome can an experience and interaction be at a clinic? It took me 40 years yo discover this a Dr Jeevan Shetty's clinic. It's spic and clean, appointments are carefully booked and adhered to. Equipment is sanitized, with all personnel using every safety measure. The issues are well explained to reduce patient anxiety. Best part, they showed ample patience with me.
reply_text: Such kind words.  Thank you sir. We will continue to do our best.

Dr. Jeevan Shetty & Dr. Mahesh Sonar has treated my mother's wisdom teeth. At the age of 77 she had lot of pain due to infection in the teeth. My high regards & respect to both the Doctors. Thank you very much. 
Yogesh kadam
